meanings.sent1: She always mispaints the walls in bright colors.
meanings.sent2: He mispaints the fence every time he tries to do it himself.
meanings.sent3: The artist mispaints the sky green instead of blue, creating a whimsical scene.
meanings.sent4: Her brush mispaints the canvas with wild strokes, like a dance of colors.
meanings.sent5: The child mispaints the picture, turning the sun into a purple circle.

meanings.sent1: The mispaints on the wall were easily noticeable.
meanings.sent2: He had to fix the mispaints on the car door.
meanings.sent3: The mispaints on the house made it look like a colorful puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The mispaints on the canvas added a unique touch to the artwork.
meanings.sent5: She carefully covered the mispaints with a fresh coat of paint.
